# Global Updates
global_updates= +no_defs +type=crs

# Define the expected order of PROJ strings
proj_order=proj,axis,datum,lat_1,lat_0,lat_ts,lon_0,alpha,gamma,k_0,k,x_0,y_0,ellps,pm,a,rf,units,to_meter,no_defs,type


# New regex for lat_0 modification
regex1=\\+lat_0=([\\d.-]+)
replacement1=\\+lat_0=$1 +lat_1=$1
codes1=2101-2104,5456-5462,5469,6792-6799,6804-6807,6852-6855,7057-7058,7060-7061,7066,7068,7111-7114,7116-7117,7121-7124,7126-7127,7531,7534,7536,7538-7540,7545,7549-7550,7557,7559,7562,7564-7565,7567,7569,7573,7576,7578-7581,7585-7586,7590,7593,7595,7597-7599,7604,7608-7609,7616,7618,7621,7623-7624,7626,7628,7632,7635,7637-7640,7644-7645,8068,8092-8093,8095-8098,8105-8112,8115-8116,8121-8122,8129-8130,8133-8134,8137-8140,8143-8144,8149-8150,8153-8154,8167-8170,8191,8193,8196-8198,8200,8203-8204,8207-8208,8214,8216,8315-8316,8321-8330,8333-8336,8339-8342,8345-8346,8525-8528,8536,8538,24100,24200,24370-24383,27500,27561-27564,27571-27574,27581-27584,27591-27594

# New regex for k modification
regex2=\\+k=([\\d.-]+)
replacement2=\\+k_0=$1
codes2=2101-2104,5456-5462,5469,6792-6799,6804-6807,6852-6855,7057-7058,7060-7061,7066,7068,7111-7114,7116-7117,7121-7124,7126-7127,7531,7534,7536,7538-7540,7545,7549-7550,7557,7559,7562,7564-7565,7567,7569,7573,7576,7578-7581,7585-7586,7590,7593,7595,7597-7599,7604,7608-7609,7616,7618,7621,7623-7624,7626,7628,7632,7635,7637-7640,7644-7645,8068,8092-8093,8095-8098,8105-8112,8115-8116,8121-8122,8129-8130,8133-8134,8137-8140,8143-8144,8149-8150,8153-8154,8167-8170,8191,8193,8196-8198,8200,8203-8204,8207-8208,8214,8216,8315-8316,8321-8330,8333-8336,8339-8342,8345-8346,8525-8528,8536,8538,24100,24200,24370-24383,27500,27561-27564,27571-27574,27581-27584,27591-27594

regex3=\\+lat_1=([\\d.-]+)
replacement3=\\+lat_ts=$1 +lat_0=-90
codes3=3275-3293

regex4=\\+lon_0=([\\d.-]+)
replacement4=\\+lonc=$1 +no_uoff
codes4=3078-3079,3167-3168,3375-3376,3468,3591,5247,6394,6497,6808-6811,6840-6843,24571,26731,26931

regex4=\\+lon_0=([\\d.-]+)
replacement4=\\+lonc=$1 +no_uoff
codes4=3078-3079,3167-3168,3375-3376,3468,3591,5247,6394,6497,6808-6811,6840-6843,24571,26731,26931

regex5=\\+proj=stere
replacement5=\\+proj=sterea
codes5=2036,2171-2174,2200,2290-2292,2953-2954,3120,3328,3844,5588,22780,28991-28992,31600,31700

regex6=\\+k=1
replacement6=
codes6=29100
